entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 3.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
